name: Nippy the Turnip
description:
v. 0.3

  • centered all nippys.
  • added nippy counter.
  • added delay to "hover" for better looks.

v. 0.2

  • made picking turnips up "hover" instead on "click".
  • better hitboxes for selecting turnip.
  • nippy slows down based on age.
  • sometimes an elderly nippy can walk off due to depression and die.
